name: Cracker Jack 2018
description:
Graduation Video Game 
School : ISART DIGITAL, the Video Game and 3D Animation / VFX School

Lead and manage a team of baseball girls and help them defeat devilish creatures in intense fights using your baseball gear.

Platform : Mobile/tablet 
Engine : Unity 
Number of players :1 

Producer : Paul LOUMOUAMOU
Game Design : Eitan AYACHE, Kevin TENGLER
Game Art : Alexandre BOVORASMY, Camille HOARAU, Marion SPEISER
Game Design & Programming : Alexandre LE MERRER, François MORAINE, Nicolas VERNOU
Music & Sound Design : Quentin MALAPEL
